featured.text: Getting a flu shot before the start of flu season gives our body a chance to build up protection against the that could make us sick.
If you are using fast film, you can take some good, quick shots of a pet by simply snapping a picture right after calling its name.
You may have to wait for a while until the animal does something interesting or moves into a position for you to get a good shot.
What is the advantage of calling your pet’s name when taking a shot of it? (A)

definition.en_def: A quick discharge of a projectile or a single attempt to take a photograph.
definition.example: He took a shot at the target and hit the bullseye.
